events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate, including their resume and cover letter.
The candidate’s application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on their background and skills in software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate’s recruitment process moving forward.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call and the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of software engineering principles and relevant technologies.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm about the role and availability for the next stages of the interview process.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with our lead developer to evaluate coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, showing excellent coding skills and deep understanding of software engineering best practices.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate’s cultural fit, benefits, and other organizational aspects.
The candidate completed the HR interview with positive feedback on interpersonal skills and alignment with company values.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate, including detailed compensation, benefits, and role responsibilities.
The candidate has provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team.
The candidate formally accepted the offer, confirming their start date and looking forward to contributing to the engineering projects.
The onboarding process has started with orientation sessions scheduled, access to engineering tools provided, and team introductions arranged.
The hiring process is now officially closed, with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering team.
